control.name: Page panel
control.helpHtml: This control gives you the capability of displaying a whole page onto another. This is especially useful for displaying pages that are supposed to be re-used on multiple pages, such as menus, headers and footers.

property.name: Name
property.helpHtml: Name that can be given to the control. Names are used to help identify controls uniquely.

property.name: Page
property.helpHtml: Sets the page to be loaded into the panel.

property.name: Footer
property.helpHtml: Sets whether the page is to perform as a footer or not.
